name: Make the Island Great Again
description:
**The game was made in less than 48 hours for this year's Kenney Jam but unfortunately I just missed the submission deadline (by a few minutes, need to plan better next time). The theme was Rotation and we were supposed to only use the assets provided by https://kenney.nl/
The page for the project was made in a rush so I'll take some time to improve it, take some screenshots and polish the game in the next few days.**

Instructions:

Rotate the Island to how it was in the beginning. Don't worry about the exact tiles but more about their type. It basically goes from Castle > Buildings > Grass and Trees > Beach > Water (Although you can't change the water tiles)

Click on a tile and use the arrow keys or "A" and "D" to rotate the neighbouring tiles. Rotate the camera also with the same keys but when you don't have a tile selected.
